name: Wireless Noise-Canceling Headphones
description: Experience immersive sound with our premium noise-canceling headphones. Features 30-hour battery life and ultra-comfortable ear cushions.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Track your health and workouts with precision. Includes heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, and GPS.

name: Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
description: RGB backlit mechanical keyboard with tactile blue switches. Perfect for gaming and typing enthusiasts.

name: 4K Ultra HD Monitor
description: 27-inch 4K monitor with stunning color accuracy and slim bezels. Ideal for designers and gamers.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: High-back mesh chair with lumbar support and adjustable armrests. Designed for all-day comfort.
